## Summary statistics


~~~
tumor_subset %>%
  filter(Day == 0) %>%
  pull(Size)
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in filter(., Day == 0): object 'tumor_subset' not found
~~~
{: .error}


~~~
tumor_subset %>%
  filter(Day == 0) %>%
  pull(Size) %>%
  mean()
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in filter(., Day == 0): object 'tumor_subset' not found
~~~
{: .error}


~~~
tumor_subset %>%
  filter(Group == 1, Day == 0) %>%
  pull(Size) %>%
  mean()

## Groupby operations


~~~
tumor_subset %>%
  filter(Day == 0) %>%
  group_by(Group) %>%
  summarize(avg_size = mean(Size))
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in filter(., Day == 0): object 'tumor_subset' not found
~~~
{: .error}


~~~
tumor_subset %>%
  group_by(Group, Day) %>%
  summarize(avg_size = mean(Size),
            sd_size = sd(Size),
            q1 = quantile(Size, probs = .25)
            )
~~~
{: .language-r}



~~~
Error in group_by(., Group, Day): object 'tumor_subset' not found
~~~
{: .error}
